name: Freak Run - Multiplayer Race
description:
●This game, similar to other run game, is not to be played alone, but it is the fun real-time online multiplayer running game that you can enjoy with other players around the world.

●Compete with randomly selected players to run the race faster.

●Multiplayer
- Stop resetting your own records!!!
- Enjoy racing with players around the world!

●About 70 costumes for about 450 combinations.

●In-game Items

●Rune System
- Use the Rune to power up the items in the game. You will see something amazing.

●Colorful Stages
- There are six stages with glamorous backgrounds. More stages are coming soon.

●Freak Run is designed for Smartphones, tablets, and pads for live online multiplayer games.
